title: About Me
text:
My name is Hong Zhuang. This is my first semester in the QMM program at Baruch College. I graduated with a Bachelor degree in Business Administration from Baruch College and a Master’s degree in Science from CUNY, City College.
Currently, I’m working as a staff accountant at a retail start-up. I am committed to become a risk analyst at a financial institution. I have passed CFA Level1, Level2 and FRM Level1. If you share the same career path, feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn.







Last Updated: Sunday 02 09, 2025 at 22:31PM
